title: Why did I get a reward?
body:
I just got a summoner icon.

I pick off meta and get report threats almost every game.  I get tilted off the planet from "?" ping spams and people's dumbness.

So.. why?

replies.body: Picking off meta is not (validly) reportable or punishable, no matter how much the garbage QQs about it.
I got a blue wrench. Not sure what its from.
I you're talking about this https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215686407/Alpha-Icon.jpg it was from participating in the New Client Alpha.

probably just an notification for receiving a an event icon I.E. the lunar revel or poro king meaning you aren't being rewarded for anything you did aside for meeting qualifications of getting the icons which were play a poro king game and click a button on the lunar revel event page that said you wanted the icon depending on on which you got
I really wish you could mute people's pings that spam them for no reason like you can for chat. I have left games 5 minutes in for that reason in the past
I keep getting that bug. It keeps saying a mystery icon but when i check, nothing there
